frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-hide-panel-light-version-without-hot-corner
frozen.shortDescription: Hide top panel except in overview.
frozen.longDescription:
Hide top panel except in overview.

For those who don't need a hot corner (e.g. running GNOME 40+ with three fingers gestures). Very very light extension. No options, no bugs. ;-)
